| Notes                   = * In {{cl|Black Panther Vol 4 3}}, the Bilderberg Conference was shown to have invited [[Wakanda]]'s king [[T'Chaka (Earth-616)|T'Chaka]] to their table in an attempt to negotiate with him the use of Wakandan goods. When he refused, hired assassin [[Ulysses Klaw (Earth-616)|Ulysses Klaw]] killed T'Chaka. This account of events retconned the previously established version of T'Chaka's death. Years later, this interpretation was overwritten by {{cl|Rise of the Black Panther Vol 1 1}}, which returned to the original version of T'Chaka's death in which Klaw invaded Wakanda and killed T'Chaka when he refused to share Vibranium with him.
